title: My league won't open.
body: When I click on the league of legends icon and nothing happens and when i try to run as administration that does not work as well. Please I would like to hear your thoughts on ways to help me ty.

replies.body:
This can often happen if your connection to the League servers as a whole is *unstable*. There are a number of common network configurations that could conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most frequent.

Let me know if you observed any change.
